thread.title: Narendra Modi in Jaunpur: “Bua, Bhatija, and Bhatija ka Yaar” were most troubled by demonetisation
thread.title_full: Narendra Modi in Jaunpur: “Bua, Bhatija, and Bhatija ka Yaar” were most troubled by demonetisation

author: FE Online
title: Narendra Modi in Jaunpur: “Bua, Bhatija, and Bhatija ka Yaar” were most troubled by demonetisation
text:
Narendra Modi in Jaunpur: “Bua, Bhatija, and Bhatija ka Yaar” were most troubled by demonetisation Narendra Modi in Jaunpur: “Bua, Bhatija, and Bhatija ka Yaar” were most troubled by demonetisation "A daughter kept crying for justice, Akhilesh made him (Gayatri Prajapati)escape," Modi said. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Updated: March 4, 2017 4:59 PM Taking jibe at Akhilesh’s invitation to have a visit at Lucknow-Agra Expressway, Modi said that CM should rather have a cycle-ride between two villages of Jaunpur.( [email protected] ) 
Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday attacked UP CM Akhilesh Yadav for poor law and order situation in Uttar Pradesh. Citing tainted minister Gayatri Prajapati incident, Modi said that Akhilesh was chanting ‘Gayatri Prajapati Mantra’, while a daughter was waiting for justice. “A daughter kept crying for justice, Akhilesh made him (Gayatri Prajapati)escape,” Modi said. Attacking Mayawati and Rahul Gandhi , Modi said that “Bua(Mayawati), Bhatija(Akhilesh), and Bhatije ka yaar (Rahul Gandhi)” were the most troubled after demonetisation. “Bua, Bhatija, aur Bhatije ke yaar ko bahut samasya hui demonetisation se, maine note bandi kar di, bank mein jana pada inhe, hisaab dena pada,” Modi said. 
Taking jibe at Akhilesh’s invitation to have a visit at Lucknow-Agra Expressway, Modi said that CM should rather have a cycle-ride between two villages of Jaunpur. “Akhilesh ji ne mujhse kaha, aap Agra-Lucknow Expressway par jaiye, aap bhi SP ko vote deenge, mai unse kehna chahta hu ki aap yahi Jaunpur ke do gaanvo ke beech mein apne yaar ko piche bitha ke jaiye, aap bhi SP ko vote nhi denge,” Modi added. 
Watch | Narendra Modi’s Pet Mega Highway Projects Make Little Progress 
Modi added that women in Uttar Pradesh can’t feel safe. “Bhaiyyo or Beheno, Aap mujhe btaiye ki betiya Uttar Pradesh mein surakshit mehsoos karti hain kya? btaiye karti hain kya? Betiyo or Maa-beheno ki izzat honi chahiye ki nahi ho ni chahiye?” The PM further added that a government which doesn’t respect women should be punished.
